title: Scroll of paper
data:
{{obsolete}}

{{item
 |itemtype=Scroll
 |name=Scroll of paper
 |appearance=different
 |cost=1
 |weight=2.0
}}
'''Scrolls of paper''' are blank [[scroll]]s, despite having something visibly written on them prior to identification. Reading them has no effect other than wasting a turn. They cannot be used to train the [[Spellcasting]] skill. 

==History==
They were removed from the game in [[0.8]]. The [[scroll of old paper]] was added to replace them in saves to ensure compatibility, but should not appear normally.
